item.title: CVE-2021-25964|2024-09-17T03:52:49.047Z -- ozzieisaacs -- calibreweb
item.description: In “Calibre-web” application, v0.6.0 to v0.6.12, are vulnerable to Stored XSS in “Metadata”. An attacker that has access to edit the metadata information, can inject JavaScript payload in the description field. When a victim tries to open the file, XSS will be triggered.
